Package org.apache.uima.analysis_engine

Interface TextAnalysisEngine

All Superinterfaces:
AnalysisEngine, CasObjectProcessor, CasProcessor, ConfigurableResource, Resource
All Known Implementing Classes:
AggregateAnalysisEngine_impl, AnalysisEngineImplBase, AnalysisEngineProcessorAdapter, AnalysisEngineServiceAdapter, CasProcessorAnnotator, JCasProcessorAnnotator, MultiprocessingAnalysisEngine_impl, PearAnalysisEngineWrapper, PrimitiveAnalysisEngine_impl, UimacppAnalysisEngineImpl
@Deprecated public interface TextAnalysisEngine extends AnalysisEngine
Deprecated.
As of v2.0, AnalysisEngine should be used instead. This interface no longer defines any additional methods beyond those in AnalysisEngine.
A Text Analysis Engine (TAE) is a type of Analysis Engine specialized for processing Text documents.
